quote_last:
,” he marveled. It was the strangest time he’d seen in his entire life.
“I apologize that the room is so messy,” Lalitha said.
“I like it. I love how you are. Are you hungry? I’m a little hungry.”
“No, Walter.” She smiled. “I’m not hungry. But I can get you something.”
“I was thinking, like, a glass of soy milk. Soy beverage.”
title: Freedom
author: Jonathan Franzen

quote_first: One of the “choppers” stopped, did an about-turn and came back to me. The flare spluttered and faded, and now the glare of the spotlight blinded me. I sat very still. It was
quote_last: . Against the noise of the blades a deeper resonant sound bit into the chill black air.
title: The Ipcress File
author: Len Deighton
